SPIN_QUESTIONS: I am afraid of people in authority
I am bothered by blushing in front of people
Parties and social events scare me
I avoid talking to people I don't know
Being criticized scares me a lot
I avoid doing things or speaking to people for fear of embarrassment
Sweating in front of people causes me distress
I avoid activities in which I am the center of attention
I avoid having to give speeches
I would do anything to avoid being criticized
Heart palpitations bother me when I am around people
I am afraid of doing things when people might be watching
Being embarrassed or looking stupid are among my worst fears
I avoid speaking to anyone in authority
Trembling or shaking in front of others is distressing to me
WSAS_QUESTIONS: Because of my social anxiety, my *ability to work* is impaired
Because of my social anxiety, my *home management* (cleaning, tidying, shopping, cooking, looking after home or children, paying bills) is impaired
Because of my social anxiety, my *social leisure activities* (with other people, e.g. parties, bars, clubs, outings, visits, dating, home entertaining) are impaired
Because of my social anxiety, my *private leisure activities* (done alone, such as reading, gardening, collecting, sewing, walking alone) are impaired
Because of my social anxiety, my ability to form and maintain *close relationships *with others, including those I live with, is impaired
PHQ9_QUESTIONS:
Please indicate how often you have been bothered by the following over the past 2 weeks. 

*Little interest or pleasure in doing things?*

Please indicate how often you have been bothered by the following over the past 2 weeks. 

*Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?*

Please indicate how often you have been bothered by the following over the past 2 weeks. 

*Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?*

Please indicate how often you have been bothered by the following over the past 2 weeks. 

*Feeling tired or having little energy*?

Please indicate how often you have been bothered by the following over the past 2 weeks. 

*Poor appetite or overeating?*

Please indicate how often you have been bothered by the following over the past 2 weeks. 

*Feeling bad about yourself â€” or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?*

Please indicate how often you have been bothered by the following over the past 2 weeks. 

*Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?*

Please indicate how often you have been bothered by the following over the past 2 weeks. 

*Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or so fidgety or restless that you have been moving a lot more than usual?

Please indicate how often you have been bothered by the following over the past 2 weeks. 

*Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or thoughts of hurting yourself in some way?*

rct_2022.os: Do you have daily access to an Apple iPhone which can connect to the App Store?
rct_2022.taking_medication: Are you currently taking any medication for your mental health? For example, sertraline for depression or propranolol for panic attacks.
rct_2022.changed_medication: Have you changed your usual mental health medication or dosage within the past 8 weeks?
rct_2022.therapy: Are you currently undergoing any therapy for your mental health?
rct_2022.alcohol_frequency: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
rct_2022.alcohol_amount: How many standard drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day?
rct_2022.alcohol_binge: How often have you had 6 or more units of alcohol on a single occasion in the last year?
rct_2022.drugs_recent: Have you used any recreational drugs *in the last three months*?
rct_2022.drugs_frequency: In the last three months, have you had a strong desire or urge to use recreational drugs at least once a week or more often?
rct_2022.drugs_concern: In the last three months, has anyone expressed concern about your use of recreational drugs?

rct_2023.os: Which operating system does your phone use?
rct_2023.internet: Do you have daily access to the internet via your phone?
rct_2023.taking_medication: Are you currently taking any medication for your mental health?
rct_2023.changed_medication: Have you changed your mental health medication or dosage within the past 8 weeks?
rct_2023.therapy: Are you currently undergoing any therapy for your mental health?
rct_2023.used_alena: I have tried/used the Alena app before
rct_2023.done_fishing_game: I have tried the fishing game where I guess where in the pond I should try to fish, along with a partner
rct_2023.done_impostor_game: I have tried the Imposter game where I guess/bluff about who in the group of players is the imposter, based on word associations
rct_2023.done_museum_game: I have tried the museum game where I describe paintings to a partner (and they describe some to me), and we try to guess the painting
rct_2023.done_replica_game: I have tried the replica game where I have to guess what different replicas/robots think of me, e.g. whether they think I am 'kind' etc
rct_2023.alcohol_frequency: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
rct_2023.alcohol_amount: How many standard drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day?
rct_2023.alcohol_binge: How often have you had 6 or more units of alcohol on a single occasion in the last year?
rct_2023.drugs_recent: Have you used any recreational drugs *in the last three months*?
rct_2023.drugs_frequency: In the last three months, have you had a strong desire or urge to use recreational drugs at least once a week or more often?
rct_2023.drugs_concern: In the last three months, has anyone expressed concern about your use of recreational drugs?

BASELINE_QUESTIONS.education: What is the *highest* level of education you have completed?
BASELINE_QUESTIONS.used_apps_before: Have you ever used any mental health apps before?
BASELINE_QUESTIONS.ever_had_therapy: Have you ever had any therapy for your mental health?
BASELINE_QUESTIONS.alena_expectations: How successful do you expect the Alena app will be in reducing your social anxiety symptoms?

rct_2022.app_adverse_effects: Have you experienced any negative effects from using the Alena app?
rct_2022.app_adverse_description: We are sorry to hear this. Please describe the negative effect(s) you have experienced from using the Alena app.
rct_2022.app_adverse_severity: Please rate the severity of the negative effect(s) you have experienced from using the Alena app.
health_adverse_effects: Have you experienced any negative effects from using the Alena app?
Have you experienced any *new,* *serious* negative health effects in the past week?
health_adverse_description: We are sorry to hear this. Please briefly describe the serious negative effect(s) you have experienced.
We are sorry to hear this. Please describe the negative effect(s) you have experienced from using the Alena app.

health_adverse_severity: Please rate the severity of the negative effect(s) you have experienced.

rct_2022.satisfaction: How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with using the Alena app overall?
rct_2022.helpfulness: How helpful have you found the Alena app?
rct_2022.recommend: How likely are you to recommend the Alena app to a person who experiences similar problems?
rct_2022.easiness: How easy to use have you found the Alena app?
rct_2022.usage: Did you get to the end of this week's exercises in the app?

rct_2023.satisfaction: How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with using the Alena app overall?
rct_2023.helpfulness: How helpful have you found the Alena app?
rct_2023.recommend: How likely are you to recommend the Alena app to a person who experiences similar problems?
rct_2023.easiness: How easy to use have you found the Alena app?
rct_2023.usage: Did you get to the end of this week's recommended activities in the app?
rct_2023.looking_for_help: Were you previously looking for help with reducing your symptoms of social anxiety?
rct_2023.default_app_searching: How likely is it that you would have sought help with social anxiety from a therapy app if you had not participated in this study?
